pages.text: Orange, representing warmth, can be used to do the most interesting things, such as your invention here.$(br2)Unlike a normal $(item)Fishing Rod$(), this piece is much more sturdy and can fish where a common rod fails. I wonder what you can bring to the surface?

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: $(italic)Caution, hot!$()$(br)With its flaming fishing hook you can not only burn your fingers...
